code: import http from"./axiosHttp";var getAll=function getAll(){return http.get("/categorys");};var get=function get(id){return http.get("/categorys/".concat(id));};var create=function create(data){return http.post("/categorys",data);};var update=function update(id,data){return http.put("/categorys/".concat(id),data);};var remove=function remove(id){console.log(id);return http.delete("/categorys/".concat(id));};export default{getAll:getAll,get:get,create:create,update:update,remove:remove};
